articles.description: Former champion Emma Raducanu loses a "rollercoaster" first-round match to American Sofia Kenin at the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Emma Raducanu out in first round after defeat by Sofia Kenin

articles.description: Liverpool agree to sign Georgia goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili from Valencia in a deal worth up to £29m.
articles.title: Liverpool agree deal to sign Georgia goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili from Valencia

articles.description: Tracy Otto's ex-boyfriend thought he has killed her. Instead Otto used his attack as the launchpad for an extraordinary second act in her life.
articles.title: Tracy Otto: Paralysed by her ex-boyfriend, now a Paralympian

articles.description: Louis Rees-Zammit is left out of the Kansas City Chiefs' active roster, but the former Wales rugby union winger could still play in the NFL in 2024.
articles.title: NFL: Louis Rees-Zammit misses out on Kansas City Chiefs' 53-man squad

articles.description: Britain's Dan Evans wins the longest match in US Open history as he beats Russia's Karen Khachanov in five hours and 35 minutes.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Dan Evans bats Karen Khachanov in New York's longest match

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Brighton & Hove Albion vs Crawley Town in the League Cup
articles.title: Brighton & Hove Albion vs Crawley Town: League Cup - BBC Sport

articles.description: An emotional Naomi Osaka makes a triumphant return to the US Open as the two-time champion beats Jelena Ostapenko in a blockbuster first round.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Naomi Osaka beats Jelena Ostapenko to make triumphant return in New York

articles.description: Dani Olmo scores the winner on his Barcelona debut against Rayo Vallecano, after finally being registered.
articles.title: Rayo Vallecano 1-2 Barcelona: Dani Olmo scores winner on debut

articles.description: Europe's qualification rules will not be changed to accommodate LIV golfers for next year's Ryder Cup, captain Luke Donald tells BBC Sport.
articles.title: Ryder Cup: Europe won't change qualification rules for LIV golfers - captain Luke Donald

articles.description: Jonnie Peacock says he is "running better than I have run for the last four years" as he aims for a third Paralympic gold medal.
articles.title: Jonnie Peacock 'ready to fight' for third Paralympic gold at Paris 2024
